mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(num, userId, subject, content, notice) VALUES (#{num}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{notice})
mapper.select: SELECT n.num, notice, n.userId, userName, subject, hitCount, NVL(fileCount, 0) fileCount, TO_CHAR(created, 'YYYY-MM-DD') created FROM notice n LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT num, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM noticeFile GROUP BY num ) f ON n.num=f.num JOIN member1 m ON n.userId=m.userId WHERE notice = 1 ORDER BY num DESC
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON n.userId=m.userId
SELECT num, n.userId, userName, subject, content, created, hitCount, notice FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON n.userId=m.userId WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select:
SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT num, subject FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON n.userId=m.userId
AND (num > #{num})
ORDER BY num ASC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT num, subject FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON n.userId=m.userId
AND (num < #{num})
ORDER BY num DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO noticeFile(fileNum, num, saveFilename, originalFilename, fileSize) VALUES (noticeFile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{saveFilename}, #{originalFilename}, #{fileSize})
